author: es09
title: the magic is building
review:
I think this game is very good. It is a lot different from other lego games because it is more challenging than the others. Now on to the review.

Pros:

  • bonus disc - The bonus disc has previews and bloopers for the new harry potter movie.
  • Magnets - You get four different magnets, each one has a different house crest.
  • Boxed set - The game comes in a boxed set.
  • The game - As I have said before the game is very good.

Cons:

  • Magnets - The magnets aren't printed they are just stickers.

Overall I thnk this is a very good game at just $10 Above the normal price.
